title: Turkey shoot
creator_credit: Filmco, Antony Ginnane, William Fayman and Brian Trenchard-Smith
brief_description: Set in 1995 where criminals are hunted in controlled environments. There is no room for individuality and anyone who dares to be different is thrown into a detention camp for brainwashing where they are tortured and become candidates for manhunts. Cast includes Steve Railsback, Olivia Hussey, Michael Craig and Carmen Duncan.
